notes: Added 8 new interruptions and removed one, for a total of 173
Updated the Lose Yourself lyric response to be less intrusive
Rectified an occasional pluralization issue in `e;flags stats`
Fixed `e;announce` classic being unable to access the configured channel
Fixed interruptions not properly handling included pings
Fixed a crash when not specifying echoed message in `e;echo` classic
Fixed a crash when not specifying difficulty in `e;flags quiz` classic
Fixed a crash when sending the beginning of a lyric set after the end
Added two new lyric response types
Added three new keyword response types
Added 6 new ping responses, for a total of 19
Added 152 new random interruptions, for a total of 166
Only one response type will now trigger on a given message
Prevented pangram detection from going off due to links
Bot prefix is now once again determined dynamically
Ensured the bot no longer responds to messages from other bots
Added debug print of the last seen message before shutdown
Fixed a problem with permissions in `e;debug`
Fixed a problem with the `e;announce` default channel
Fixed a crash when starting a game in `e;wordle` classic
Fixed debug prefix still being in use
Fixed message tests crash due to missing function argument
Fixed several crashes caused by `e;config`
Fixed a typo causing a crash in `e;announce`
Every command has been rewritten to support slash commands
Added `e;flags`, `e;image`, `e;quote`, `e;reload`, `e;tictactoe`, and `e;wordle`
Removed `e;admintest`, `e;embedtest`, `e;modaltest`, and `e;responses`
Added context menu options `ask 8ball` and `pin or unpin`
`e;version` has been split from `e;info`, which now shows a basic bot description
`e;setstatus` has been merged into `e;config`
`e;translatecodes` has been merged into `e;help`
`e;unpin` has been merged into `e;pin`
`e;announce` can now announce to any channel
`e;help` can now give more detailed info by passing a command
Notifications config option now supports no notification at all
`e;diceroll` now enforces an upper limit on the number of die faces
Anyone can now suggest to the maybepile
Added pangram and mentions detection
Lyric responses now only work if the message ends with the lyric
Alphabetical/periodic responses now only check messages with A-Z content
Plus far too many more small fixes and rewrites
Updated e;info to show initial version and hotfixes
Fixed crash when using e;unpin
Minor changes to ping responses
Fixed crash when testing for alphabetical messages
e;maybepile view now always lists either the author or the claimer
Claimers can now unclaim or deprioritize things on maybepile
Added 15 new random conversation interruptions
Decreased the chances of BirdBox interrupting to 1/5000
BirdBox now responds to being pinged (currently 15 responses)
BirdBox no longer responds to messages sent by any bot
Fixed pin permissions not working in threads
Added embed to e;announce
Added new serverside config options for response types and pin command
Added claim, edit, and delete buttons to e;maybepile view
Added claim system to maybepile to establish development status
e;coinflip now has a small change to land on the edge
e;maybepile item selector no longer disables after one use
Alphabetical order response now changes if all words are the same
Added randomChoice utils function for choosing a random array element
Most commands now reply to command use
Added 15 new 8ball responses
e;8ball, e;ping, e;rr, and e;translate now use an embed
Added help description for diceroll & updated others
Rewrote help command to import from command info
Ported remaining modernmode functions to their respective files
Renamed modernmode file to be more descriptive about its function
Fixed issue with both canary and main responding to messages
Fixed crashes due to missing message send perms
Fixed typo in 8ball response
Added `e;coinflip` and `e;diceroll` commands
Added `e;setstatus` to change bot status
Added snipe image support for cached images
Added privacy policy and `e;privacy` command
Added utils file for utility functions
Changed dev storage to use a JSON file
Changed the way arguments are passed to commands
Changed pin/unpin so devs can pin in any channel
Fixed message saying "added" when editing responses
Actually actually deleted db-test and noreply
User config can no longer be changed by any user during modification
`e;config` now defaults to user as the initial mode
Fixed occasional misspellings in periodic table notifications
Fixed inconsistent placement of lyric responses
`e;maybepile`, `e;responses`, `e;help`, and `e;config` now use modals/buttons
Added a new config setting, Birdbox Classic, to use old text interfaces
Added e;settings as an alternative name for `e;config`
`e;config` no longer shows server settings unless requested
Reordered message detection with respect to canary status
Merged noreply into echo as the initial argument
Reduced the time window for jinx detection
Certain error messages no longer say undefined when no input is provided
Fixed a crash when attempting to send something in a restricted channel
Fixed some instances where periodic table detection would fail
Fixed issue where non-dev users can delete responses
Fixed a typo in `e;help` regarding e;info
Fixed a typo in `e;config`
Actually removed e;db-test this time
Added jinx detector for two people saying the same thing at a similar time
Added element detector for messages made of periodic table abbreviations
Added a log system for detected messages to put them in their own channel
Added `e;config` command to configure user and server settings
Added 8ball emoji to the beginning of e;8ball responses
Added randomized footer text to e;snipe responses
e;info now takes "all" after the command to see past patches
Snipes are now opt-in rather than being required (use `e;config`)
Moved message-parsing functions out of main.js and into their own file
Removed useless variable declaration from translate help
Removed useless function call from `e;maybepile`
Trimmed unnecessary data that was being stored by snipes
Fixed bugged error message when a response keyword is already in use
Fixed several edge cases with alphabetical detection, including emojis
Fixed a crash when snipes are missing data
Fixed bug where maybepile edits would call the title a desc or author
Fixed bug where response additions would detect all keywords as duplicates
Removed leftover code from `e;maybepile` in `e;responses`
Added more descriptive error messages to `e;responses`
Fixed old e;info notes having spaces in command names
Fixed undefined in patch notes when contribs is empty
Added dates to e;info patch notes
Added 15 e;8ball messages, bringing the total to 100
Made maybepile embeds inline for cleaner display
Fixed `e;maybepile` breaking if item count is over 25
Replaced all instances of string concatenation with template literals
Removed e;db-test because it was useless
Added `e;responses` to manage stickers and lyrics
Added lyric response functionality
Removed hardcoded sticker responses
Updated `e;help` to reflect these changes
Reworked e;info internally to allow for multiple patches
Fixed `e;maybepile` bug where page numbers would not work if "view" is assumed
Leading spaces are no longer included in maybepile titles if created using the initial command
`e;help` maybepile now accurately reflects these changes
Added e;info to display bot info, version, and patch notes
`e;help` is now reformatted to be shorter and easier to read
`e;help` can now take arguments for certain command-specific pages
Rewrote `e;maybepile` to be modifiable with Discord commands
Reworked translation codes directory so pages are alphabetized
Translation codes are now found under `e;help` translate (page) and e;translate codes (page)
Added array of dev user ids, to be passed to commands like `e;maybepile` for perm checks
e;command name are once again case-sensitive (this fixes bugs with echo-based commands)
Fixed bug where pinning a pinned message would return successful (and likewise with unpinning)
Updated bot credits to be more accurate
